comments.body:
minor: this will be pretty small, right?  wouldn't it be easier to write to a `ByteArrayOutputStream` rather than messing with files?

```
val bytes = new ByteArrayOutputStream()
val out = new ObjectOutputStream(bytes)
...
val in = new ObjectInputStream(new ByteArrayInputSream(bytes.toByteArray()))
...
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +107,111 @@      out.writeObject(committer)
      out.close
      in = new ObjectInputStream(new FileInputStream(serData))
      val result = in.readObject()
